awd_titl_txt: Engineering Research Equipment Grant:  A High Speed         Interconnection Network of Microprocessors
awd_abstract_narration: An interconnection network of microprocessors will be provided for              researchers at the University of Pennsylvania for research in the               Department of Electrical Engineering.                                                                                                                           This equipment is provided under the Instrumentation Grants for                 Research in Computer and Information Science and Engineering program.                                                                                           The research for which the equipment is to be used will be in the study         of routing strategies for broadband networks.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: TRUSTEES OF THE UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA, THE
